about_the_game:
Psynostic is a game that let you incarn a psychologist. Find the words to make your patient speak and make the good diagnostic. You have a full liberty of questions available thanks to the LLM (Large Language Model).

Use your diagnostic book to have guideline about potential questions and to keep track of your suspected diagnostic.

Psynostic use new IA model to offer the best gaming experience. The LLM allows full liberty for the player. There are multiple ways to get info about the patient and conduct a diagnostic like in real life.

What is LLM ?

  • LLM stand for Large Language Model and is behind every recent chatbot like ChatGPT. Basicaly what it does is text completion.

Psynostic use the Whisper model which is the best speech-to-text available.

As an psychologist you work in your own office but sometime you may help the Justice and diagnostic criminal. Your mission is to know if the criminal is responsible for his act.

There are 16 unique characters to diagnostic with their own story. Some of them are criminal, other aren't.

There is a system of detection of emotion. It use a python package to detect the emotion from text. The system will automatically adjust the shape of the bubble and the text.

content_descriptors.notes: The game may tackle sensitive subject link to mental illness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 780 or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game run LLM (Large Language Model) locally which requires good processing power. It'll automatically run on the GPU if compatibility enabled. Please check your GPU compatibility in the documentation.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: I7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 SUPER
  • Additional Notes: This game run LLM (Large Language Model) locally which requires good processing power. It'll automatically run on the GPU if compatibility enabled. Please check your GPU compatibility in the documentation.

short_description: Psynostic is a simulation game about making psychological diagnostic. Talk with various patient and used your words guided by your diagnostic book to discover their mental illness.
